channel.title: Comments on: Better Late Than Never, My 2011 Goals
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.description: my appraisals are in the summer, and that's when i set my goals. yay for being differnt!
item.content:encoded: my appraisals are in the summer, and that’s when i set my goals. yay for being differnt!

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.description: Great, I can remember the last time you had an PHP/MySQL environment.
item.content:encoded: Great, I can remember the last time you had an PHP/MySQL environment.

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.description: Good luck on the "good first-time dad" (does that mean another one will be on the way shortly?) and "[not] fall off the internet". But, I figure if anyone can do it, you can. Buena suerte!
item.content:encoded: Good luck on the “good first-time dad” (does that mean another one will be on the way shortly?) and “[not] fall off the internet”. But, I figure if anyone can do it, you can. Buena suerte!

item.title: By: Janice Lee
item.dc:creator: Janice Lee
item.content:encoded:
Eli, I had no idea the baby’s out!;) Makes me feel all mushy and giddy. I’m so happy for you. Congratulations!!! He’s beautiful. I’m sure you’re going to be a fun dad.

Congratulations on and thank you for achieving some of your 2010 goals. 28 blog entries? Ha! You know I read all of them, right??

Good luck on your 2011 goals ðŸ˜‰

(I’ll remember to be all nice to you every time we meet this year so I can get babysitting privileges :P)

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: Pretty sure you don't have to worry about being a "good first-time dad" You're going to be a great father! I'll handle the role of the, give the boy as much candy when I visit, figure to him :P
item.content:encoded: Pretty sure you don’t have to worry about being a “good first-time dad” You’re going to be a great father! I’ll handle the role of the, give the boy as much candy when I visit, figure to him ðŸ˜›
